articles.title: Kim Kardashian still my wife, says Ye amid ongoing divorce - Punch Newspapers
articles.description: American rapper, Ye, formerly known as Kanye West, has stated that reality TV star, Kim Kardashian is still his wife, despite their ongoing divorce.
articles.content:
American rapper, Ye, formerly known as Kanye West, has stated that reality TV star, Kim Kardashian is still his wife, despite their ongoing divorce.

articles.title: Good news for Joe Biden: America is getting back to work - CNN Philippines
articles.description: America's job market recovery hit a roadblock in the late summer and early fall. In recent months, the tally of jobs added to the economy has been disappointingly low.
articles.content:
